description: This file defines a UserModel class providing data access methods for user-related database operations within a healthcare appointment management system backend.

classes.name: UserModel
classes.description: A class encapsulating database access methods for user entities, including create, find, list, update, and remove operations.

methods.name: create({ name, email, passwordHash, role })
methods.description: Creates a new user record in the database with provided details.

methods.name: findById(id)
methods.description: Retrieves user information by user ID.

methods.name: findWithSecretByEmail(email)
methods.description: Fetches a user by email, including sensitive fields like password hash, for authentication purposes.

methods.name: list({ role, q, limit = 50, offset = 0 } = {})
methods.description: Lists users with optional filtering by role and search query, supporting pagination.

methods.name: update(id, { name, email, role, passwordHash })
methods.description: Updates user details; password hash is optional.

ctags.name: create
ctags.pattern: /^  static async create({ name, email, passwordHash, role }) {$/

ctags.name: list
ctags.pattern: /^  static async list({ role, q, limit = 50, offset = 0 } = {}) {$/

ctags.name: update
ctags.pattern: /^  static async update(id, { name, email, role, passwordHash }) {$/
